item.title: The Lahman Database
item.description: Let’s work with the Lahman baseball database in RStudio. First, let’s load some packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) Now let’s run some code: Batting%>% select(playerID,teamID,yearID,HR)%>% filter(HR>50) ## playerID teamID yearID HR ## 1 ruthba01 NYA 1920 54 ## 2 ruthba01 NYA 1921 59 ## 3 ruthba01 NYA 1927 60 ## 4 ruthba01 NYA 1928 54 ## 5 wilsoha01 CHN 1930 56 ## 6 foxxji01 PHA 1932 58 ## 7 greenha01 DET 1938 58 ## 8 kinerra01 PIT 1947 51 ## 9 mizejo01 NY1 1947 51 ## 10 kinerra01 PIT 1949 54 ## 11 mayswi01 NY1 1955 51 ## 12 mantlmi01 NYA 1956 52 ## 13 mantlmi01 NYA 1961 54 ## 14 marisro01 NYA 1961 61 ## 15 mayswi01 SFN 1965 52 ## 16 fostege01 CIN 1977 52 ## 17 fieldce01 DET 1990 51 ## 18 mcgwima01 OAK 1996 52 ## 19 griffke02 SEA 1997 56 ## 20 griffke02 SEA 1998 56 ## 21 mcgwima01 SLN 1998 70 ## 22 sosasa01 CHN 1998 66 ## 23 mcgwima01 SLN 1999 65 ## 24 sosasa01 CHN 1999 63 ## 25 bondsba01 SFN 2001 73 ## 26 gonzalu01 ARI 2001 57 ## 27 rodrial01 TEX 2001 52 ## 28 sosasa01 CHN 2001 64 ## 29 rodrial01 TEX 2002 57 ## 30 thomeji01 CLE 2002 52 ## 31 jonesan01 ATL 2005 51 ## 32 howarry01 PHI 2006 58 ## 33 ortizda01 BOS 2006 54 ## 34 rodrial01 NYA 2007 54 ## 35 bautijo02 TOR 2010 54 ## 36 davisch02 BAL 2013 53
